item.description:
Are you ready for a quickie road trip?   Let's meet at the winery/vineyard for a tasting and then head on over to the Spring Collaborative Artists Show in town.   If it's a really nice day why not plan on bringing a blanket or camp chair and a snack to share?   The grounds are lovely and picnicking is welcome. 

Ann Chuk, who is a member of the Widow/Widowers group is hosting the Artist's event on her private grounds in Woodstock. 

There is a small fee for the wine tasting. 

Admission is free to the Artists Show/Sale. 

 

Links below will provide you with more details on the day's visits!!

 

http://www.taylorbrookewinery.com/index.html

 

https://www.facebook.com/?ref=tn_tnmn#!/photo.php?fbid=10200797695362599&set=pcb.10200797711362999&type=1&theater

group.name: The Eastern CT Widows and Widowers Meetup Group

item.name: Celebrate Spring!
